verbs.description: [ARG0: AT&T Inc.] [V: said] [ARG1: it was contacted by Special Counsel Robert Mueller ’s team late last year for information about payments the company had made to President Donald Trump ’s longtime personal lawyer for “ insights ” into the White House] .
